inscription: Inscription in blue ink on paper backing from original frame (in object file): Tchelitchew drew this likeness of Monroe Wheeler, preliminary to a portrait never painted, in 1945. M. W. gave it to me  Glenway Wescott
provenance: The artist, New York; given to Monroe Wheeler, New York & Union Township, N.J., until 1945, given to Glenway Wescott, New York & Union Township, N.J.. Clayton Cole, New York. David M. Daniels, New York; given to MIA, 1966.
title: Portrait of Monroe Wheeler
